price: 96. Ku tir xumaanta sida u wanaagsan, Annagaa Ogsoon waxay sheegayaan.
arabic: ٱدۡفَعۡ بِٱلَّتِي هِيَ أَحۡسَنُ ٱلسَّيِّئَةَۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: id'faʿ bi-allatī hiya aḥsanu al-sayi-ata naḥnu aʿlamu bimā yaṣifūna
